target.name: cdk.availability.no
target.echo:
The CDK converter classes are NOT available.
1. The project can be checked out from from: cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.cdk.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/cdk co cdk 2. A stable release can be downloaded from: http://sourceforge.net/projects/cdk After downloading call: ant dist and copies the generated jar files in the cdk/dist/jar directory to ${project.name.cvs}/lib. Copy additionally the JSX.jar from cdk/jar to ${project.name.cvs}/lib. If you want to use 2D layout, don't forget to recompile ${project.name.full} to generate the interface class.

echo.message: The CDK converter classes are available.

target.name: plucker.availability.no
target.echo:
The Plucker (E-Book) distiller java classes are NOT available.
1. The Plucker (E-Book) distiller java archive can be downloaded from: http://www.plkr.org/ 2. Copy the plucker-build-*.jar to ${project.name.cvs}/lib.

echo.message: The Weka data mining classes are available.

target.name: weka.availability.no
target.echo:
The Weka data mining java classes are NOT available.
1. The Weka data mining java archive can be downloaded from: http://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/ml/weka/ 2. For using Weka you should modify the constructors in weka.core.Attributes from 'protected' to 'public' and use the recompiled Weka sources. 3. Copy recompiled weka*.jar to ${project.name.cvs}/lib.

echo.message: The Plucker (E-Book) distiller java classes are available.
